document_data.name: Peasants' District
document_data.mainbody: The '''Peasants' District''' was a district of [[Huzuz]], the City of Delights, in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Description: The Peasants' District was found in the [[People's Quarter]] and near the center of Huzuz. It was roughly bordered in a triangular pattern by the [[South District]] to the south, the [[Clothiers' District]] to the west, and the [[Central District]] to the northeast. The Peasants' District was also bordered by the [[Road to Enlightenment|Enlightened Way]] to the south, the [[Agricultural Promenade|Farmers' Road]] to the west, and the [[Merchants' Avenue]] to the east. The [[Grand Bazaar]] abutted the northern tip of the Peasants' District.
document_data.Inhabitants: The Peasant's District was a mostly residential area, serving as the home for the majority of Huzuz's laborers and farmers. This was a relatively peaceful district because there were no grand attractions or wealthy inhabitants with valuable property to steal.

* the [[Merchants' Avenue]]
